snippet: The $2.6-billion installment will shore up the Cypriot economy after the near-collapse of the country’s banking sector.
abstract: Cyprus receives 2 billion euros ($2.6 billion) in first installment of European Union bailout package, aimed at buttressing economy after near-collapse of its banking sector; second allocation of up to 1 billion euros will be transferred by June 30.
lead_paragraph: The $2.6-billion installment will shore up the Cypriot economy after the near-collapse of the country’s banking sector.

headline.main: Cyprus Gets First Installment of Bailout Funds
headline.print_headline:
Cyprus Gets
First Funds
Of Bailout
Package
